DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , exploratory pilot study patient T1D . The study involve two daytime clinical research center visit 7-14 day apart . Subjects receive single injection G-Pen™ ( glucagon injection ) visit .
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus least 24 month Pregnant Lactating HbA1c > 10.5 % screening Use > 2.0 U/kg total insulin dose per day Inadequate bilateral venous access arm Renal insufficiency Congestive heart failure , NYHA class II , III IV Active malignancy within 5 year screen Major surgical operation within 30 day prior screen Seizure bleed disorder Glycogen storage disease Active substance alchohol abuse
